::Obfucious::
    "Hmm?  Oh.  Yes, you.  I'll get back to you shortly."  He stood there 
pondering the meaning of phlegm for a while.  "Okay now I'll attack you for 
disturbing me."  He stood there a while more pondering how to attack.
